name: FanConnectionRouter
description:
draw2d.layout.connection.FanConnectionRouter

Automatic router that spreads its {@link draw2d.Connection Connections} in a fan-like fashion upon collision.

constructor.name: FanConnectionRouter

functions.name: onInstall
functions.description: Callback method if the router has been assigned to a connection.

functions.name: route
functions.description: Layout the hands over connection in a manhattan like layout

parameters.name: routingHints.startMoved
parameters.description: is true if just the start location has moved

parameters.name: routingHints.destMoved
parameters.description: is true if the destination location has changed

functions.name: routeCollision
functions.description: route the connection if connections overlap. Two connections overlap if the combination of source and target anchors are equal.

functions.name: onUninstall
functions.description: Callback method if the router has been removed from the connection.

functions.name: canRemoveVertexAt
functions.description: Callback method for the PolyLine or Connection to check if it possible to remove a vertex from the list. The router can send an veto for this. Per default it is not possible to remove any vertex from the PolyLine exceptional if any interactive router is installed.

functions.name: canRemoveSegmentAt
functions.description: Callback method for the PolyLine or Connection to verify that a segment is deletable.

functions.name: getPersistentAttributes
functions.description: Tweak or enrich the polyline persistence data with routing information

functions.name: setPersistentAttributes
functions.description: set the attributes for the polyline with routing information

functions.name: onDrag
functions.description: The draw2d.Connection delegates the drag operation to the router. The router can handle the different constraints of the connection.

parameters.name: dx
parameters.description: the x difference between the start of the drag drop operation and now

parameters.name: dy
parameters.description: the y difference between the start of the drag drop operation and now

parameters.name: dx2
parameters.description: The x diff since the last call of this dragging operation

parameters.name: dy2
parameters.description: The y diff since the last call of this dragging operation

functions.name: verticesSet
functions.description: Called by the connection if the vertices set outside. This enforce the router to avoid full autoroute. E.g. InteractiveManhattanRouter
